aka: The Return of the Dead Army

cast.name: 罗扎·奥古努斯提 Roza Anagnosti

writer.name: 奇米特尔·奥古努斯提 Dhimiter Anagnosti
伊斯梅尔·卡达莱 Ismail Kadare

director.name: 奇米特尔·奥古努斯提 Dhimiter Anagnosti

trans_title: The Return of the Dead Army
introduction: Fifteen years after the end of Second World War, two Italians, a colonel and a priest, return to Albania in order to collect and repatriate the bones of their fellow countrymen who died in military operation. Among other things, they discover that an Italian general raped a young woman and was then murdered by her mother. The movie, an adaptation of Ismail Kadare’s classic novel The General of the Dead Army, constructs multiple narratives to expose the horror of war.
